ai-thig5.6:1.2_0: from the lay life to homelessness.
ai-thig5.6:2.4_0: I never knew the goal of the ascetic life.
ai-thig5.6:3.1_0: I was struck with a sense of urgency,
ai-thig5.6:3.2_0: as I was sitting in my hut:
ai-thig5.6:4.2_0: trampled by old age and sickness.
ai-thig5.6:4.4_0: there is no time for me to be careless.”
ai-thig5.6:5.2_0: of phenomena such as the aggregates.
ai-thig5.6:5.3_0: I stood up with mind liberated,
ai-thig5.6:5.4_0: and have fulfilled the Buddha’s instructions.
